sentences.english: Personal virtues and public virtues are two concepts, which are both different from and related with each other.
sentences.chinese: 私德与公德是两个既相区分又相联系的概念。

sentences.english: Civilization eco-villages still exist in the building are many factors restricting the development of ethics.
sentences.chinese: 文明生态村建设中还存在著不少制约公德发展的因素。

sentences.english: Act responsibly and in my heart, expensive line of civilization.
sentences.chinese: 公德在我心，文明贵在行。

sentences.english: The second factor was to promote compassionate and civic-minded children in my own house.
sentences.chinese: 其二则是为了促进我自己孩子的同情心和公德心。

sentences.english: House supervisors must obey China law and social moral.
sentences.chinese: 遵守中国法律法规，弘扬社会公德。

sentences.english: Inspiration is one of the important ways of social morality cultivation education.
sentences.chinese: 激励是大学生公德养成教育中的重要方法之一。

sentences.english: Private and public virtues were at the lowest ebb.
sentences.chinese: 公德与私德均在衰落之中。

sentences.english: Common people moral includes not only social moral, but also private moral.
sentences.chinese: 百姓道德不但包括社会公德，也包括个人私德。

sentences.english: Chinese up-to-date construction of social morality must changes from private loyalty to Public loyalty.
sentences.chinese: 中国当代的公德建设要实现从私忠到公忠的转变。
